sqlMap.sql: TRANSFER_ID, MATERIAL_ID, QUANTITY, UNIT, PROCESSING, PROCESSING_MAN, PROCESSING_DATE, REMARK, OUT_INFO_DETAIL_ID,QUANTITY3
sqlMap.select: SELECT SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER_DETAIL.TRANSFER_ID, SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER_DETAIL.PROCESSING, SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER_DETAIL.PROCESSING_MAN, SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER_DETAIL.PROCESSING_DATE, SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER_DETAIL.remark, SF_MATERIALS.MATERIAL_ID, SF_MATERIALS.NAME, SF_MATERIALS.QUANTITY, SF_MATERIALS.UNIT, SF_MATERIALS.DESCRIPTION, SF_MATERIALS.ENTRUST_ID,SF_MATERIALS.QUANTITY2,SF_MATERIALS.QUANTITY3, SF_MATERIALS.MATERIAL_TYPE,SF_MATERIALS.BIANHAO,SF_MATERIALS.APPEND_MATERIAL_ID, SF_MATERIALS.ATTACH_FILE, SF_MATERIALS.ATTACH_FILE_BLOBID, SF_MATERIALS.JIAN_HOU_CHULI_TYPE, SF_MATERIALS.SAVE_CONDITON, SF_MATERIALS.REMARK, SF_MATERIALS.JIAN_HOU_STORE_TIME, SF_MATERIALS.SAVE_ADDRESS, SF_MATERIALS.BAR_CODE FROM SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER_DETAIL, SF_MATERIALS WHERE SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER_DETAIL.MATERIAL_ID = SF_MATERIALS.MATERIAL_ID and SF_MATERIALS_TRANSFER_DETAIL.TRANSFER_ID = #transferId:DECIMAL#
